column1: AAAI Technical Track: AI for Social Impact
Community search is an important problem in network analysis
column2: which has attracted much attention in recent years. It starts with some given nodes
column3: pays more attention to local network structures
column4: and gets personalized resultant communities quickly. In this paper
column5: we argue that there are many real scenarios where some nodes are not allowed to appear in the community. Then
column6: we introduce a new concept called forbidden nodes and present a new problem of forbidden nodes aware community search to describe these scenarios.
